title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When hitting F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. 'org.apache.ant'), I expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. However, I am getting a message that says 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant''. I don't understand what this message means.
OB: When hitting F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. 'org.apache.ant'), I get the message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant''.
EB: I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open a binary project in the IDE.
2. Select the project and hit F4.
3. Observe the message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'' appearing.
